title: @RIOT: Augmented Chests Not Guaranteeing 975+ RP Skin Shards
body:
I just bought a ton of Augmented Chests, and I opened one and received Debonair Vi, and a Draaaven Icon Shard.
Why didn't I receive this additional 975 skin shard you speak of that is guaranteed?

> An additional guaranteed Champion Skin Shard (worth 975 RP or higher)

I only bought the chests after seeing a Riot post claiming that it was such as a normal chest, but also guaranteed another skin shard, only to find out I was getting 540RP Skin Shards, or nothing at all.



EDIT: Just opened another one and did not get a Shard worth 975 RP or higher.
EDIT again: This has happened an additional 4 times.

replies.body: Looking into this for you, I see that the majority of the extra shards received were +975 with exception to the ones mentioned.  We discovered that there was an error in messaging, and we have [updated our project post](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/E2ArVn9s-project-holy-shit-theres-a-lot-going-on-lets-break-this-down?comment=00110000).  The Augmented Cache will guarantee a random champion skin shard, but it doesn't guarantee a 975.  I know this was a confusing circumstance, and I'm sorry about that!
Well, that's certainly a letdown... Especially since it's a random shard, and not a skin guaranteed to be for a champion you own, that's a LOT more (mostly uninteresting) skins in the random pool.
